index_of_abreviations.TAA: Tritiated Amino Acids / [3H]-Amino Acids (includes [3H]-leucine, [3H]-proline, D-[3H]-aspartate, [3H]-Leucine, [3H]-lysine, tritiated amino acid mixture, 3[H]-Leucin, 3[H]-Proline, [3H]-Leucin, [3H]-Prolin, [35S]-methionine, [2,3H]-proline, [3H]-methionine, leucine, lysine, phenylalanine, proline, L-3,4,5,H Leucine, L2,3,H Proline, [3H]-leucin, [3H]-arginine, [3H]-leucine, H3-Proline, [3H]-amino acids, {3H]-leucine, 3H-Leucine, 3H-Lysine, 3H-Proline, [3H]proline, Leucine, Proline, [2H]-proline, H3-Leucine, H3-proline, H-leucine, H-proline, H-Leucine, H-Proline, 3H-leucine, 3Hproline)
index_of_abreviations.[3H]-Leucine: Tritiated leucine / [3H]-leucine includes L-[4,5-^3H]-Leucine, L-[4,5-^3H(N)] Leucine, L-[3,4,5-^3H] Leucine and so on
index_of_abreviations.[3H]-Proline: Tritiated proline / [3H]-proline includes L-[5-^3H]-Proline, L-[2,3-^3H]-Proline, L-[2,3,4,5-^3H]-Proline and so on
index_of_abreviations.[(35)S]-Methionine: The amino acid methionine that has been radioactively labeled with sulfur-35 (^35S)
index_of_abreviations.[3H]-WGA: Tritiated WGA / WGA that has been radioactively labeled with tritium (^3H) on the acetyl group
index_of_abreviations.GB: Green fluorescent beads / Fluorescein-labelled, green, fluorescent latex microspheres
index_of_abreviations.RB: Rhodamine red beads / Rhodamine-labeled latex beads
index_of_abreviations.CTB: Cholera toxin subunit-B / Cholera toxin B subunit
index_of_abreviations.CTB-gold: Cholera toxin B subunit conjugated with colloidal gold / Gold-conjugated cholera toxin B subunit
index_of_abreviations.CTB-red: Cholera toxin B subunit conjugated with alexa fluor 594
index_of_abreviations.CTB-green: Cholera toxin B subunit conjugated with alexa fluor 488
index_of_abreviations.CTB-A: cholera toxin B subunit conjugated with Alexa fluor 555
index_of_abreviations.WGA-HRP: WGA conjugated to HRP / HRP conjugated to WGA
index_of_abreviations.CVS strain: 'Challenge Virus Standard' strain of the rabies virus
index_of_abreviations.322/60: Tracer with the same transport time as DY and FB (GLKR84)
